      • addToMap

        private AtomicInteger addToMap(int id,
                     int x,
                     boolean reset)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Adds the Int x to the ConcurrentHashmap for the server.
        Parameters:
        id - Key for the client in the ConcurrentHashmap.
        x - Int to add to the value for the client.
        reset - Decides if the value gets reset.
        Returns:
        The new Value for that key.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
